141,124,179,124,179,148,149,148,####VUI
183,117,237,117,238,148,183,148,####LÒNG
240,118,311,118,312,147,241,147,####KHÔNG
313,117,355,117,356,153,314,153,####ĐẶT
358,117,413,117,414,146,358,147,####CHÂN
417,117,453,116,454,146,418,146,####LÊN
456,112,498,112,499,145,458,146,####BỒN
502,112,542,113,544,145,502,146,####CẦU
157,151,201,151,198,167,154,167,####Please
203,151,239,150,235,167,199,167,####don't
240,153,261,151,261,167,237,171,####put
262,154,295,154,290,168,261,171,####your
296,150,322,151,319,167,293,167,####feet
323,154,339,154,339,166,321,166,####on
343,150,363,152,362,166,340,166,####the
365,150,403,149,401,165,364,165,####toilet!

439,174,471,173,472,204,440,204,####BÃI

204,209,239,209,236,225,201,225,####don't

281,211,298,211,296,224,279,224,####on
301,209,322,209,320,223,299,223,####the

142,243,178,242,177,268,147,269,####VUI
182,237,236,236,236,267,182,268,####LÒNG

156,274,201,274,199,291,152,292,####Please
202,273,258,273,255,293,200,293,####flushing
259,274,298,272,294,289,259,289,####water
301,271,331,271,328,288,296,288,####after
331,274,361,270,358,288,329,288,####use!
